column3: Without the fix PyCustomMember.resolvesToClass(classQName) does not work properly.
new PyCustomMember(name).resolvesToClass(qName) wont resolve because it would use pass as a target class
Please add a unit test that shows what problem you're solving. See the unit tests in PyResolveTest and the test data for them in testData/resolve/.
@vlasovskikh please take a look at this
@da1z @fitermay Thanks for adding a test! Could you please add a call to PyCustomMember.resolvesToClass(classQName) to the test? It was mentioned by @da1z as the incentive for this PR.
Please squash all your commits into one. We strongly prefer that PRs don't contain any merge commits as they have been proven difficult to rebase.
@da1z @fitermay Thanks for your PR! I've rebased it onto master.
